about.title: About WARM+
about.subtitle: Your trusted partner for luxury villa rentals in Phuket
about.ourStoryText1: Founded in 2010, WARM+ has become the premier destination for luxury villa rentals in Phuket.
about.ourStoryText2: Over the years, we have carefully curated a collection of the finest villas in Phuket.
about.ourStoryText3: Today, WARM+ is trusted by thousands of guests from around the world.
about.whyChooseSubtitle: Our advantages make us the best choice

features.trustedServiceDesc: Proven reputation with thousands of satisfied customers
features.localExpertiseDesc: Deep knowledge of the region and best locations

about.missionText: To provide unforgettable luxury villa experiences that exceed expectations
about.visionText: To be the most trusted name in luxury villa rentals across Southeast Asia
about.valuesQualityText: We never compromise on the quality of our villas or services
about.valuesIntegrityText: Honest and transparent dealings with all our guests and partners
about.valuesExcellenceText: Continuous improvement in everything we do
